name: Diagram Exhibition
summary: The Diagram Exhibition app for Meta Quest headsets enables immersive classroom and self-study experiences. Learners and instructors explore walkable 3D datasets in a museum-like room. Instructors (and self-learners) can switch datasets via the controller, automatically updating students’ views. Communication occurs traditionally by voice in the classroom or via Zoom online.  All datasets are provided together with free course materials. Instructors may also create custom data by contacting the app author.
